oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Herrington Sisters performances - tape 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 4 of various performances featuring the Herrington Trio (performers).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Herrington Trio
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- The Little Old Church In The Valley (Herrington Trio) -- When Mother Nature Sings Her Lullaby (Herrington Trio) -- When It's Lamplightin' Time In The Valley (Herrington Trio) -- In My Merry Oldsmobile (Herrington Trio) -- A Good Man Is Hard To Find (Herrington Trio) -- Wabash Blues (Herrington Trio) -- The West, A Nest, And You (Herrington Trio) -- All I Do Is Dream Of You (Herrington Trio) -- I Wonder If You Feel The Way I Do (Herrington Trio) -- Drifting And Dreaming (Herrington Trio) -- When It's Night Time In Nevada (Herrington Trio) -- Lonesome Valley Sally (Herrington Trio)
